message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Fair is fair!
I think I deserve a bit more, don't you?
Let's be reasonable, Bob. I'm willing to give you a little more, but I'm not going to give in to your demands. How about we split it 55/45?
I'll meet you halfway between our last offers. This is as low as I'm willing to go.
Okay, Bob. I'm getting tired of this back and forth. I'll give you a slightly better deal, but this is my final offer. Let's end this.
